page.title: 05A Day at School.
page.content: The bell goes at 9.15am.We go in and take off our coats.The teacher takes the register and then we go up to the hall for assembly.We sing a hymn, have a talk and say some prayers.We go back to the class and work at different things.Playtime is at 10.40am.We then do some more work and finish at 12.15pm.for lunch.The sandwich group go out to play and the rest go up to the hall to eat.They may have roast lamb,vegetables and a pudding.The sandwich group then swap places.At 1.40pm. we return to the class.We may go to the hall or the field for P.E. or games,or work together on projects. The home bell goes at 3.30pm.The Grimston bus goes then, but the Queensway bus goes about 5 minutes later.
